wikitext.*:
The '''Appledore Family''' were a family of [[Big Folk]] who lived in [[Bree]]. Only one member of the family is known, [[Rowlie Appledore]], who was killed in fighting at [[Bree]] during the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>{{RK|VI7}}</ref>
==Etymology==
Appledore is an old word for "[[apples|apple-tree]]" and survives in English place-names. It represents a dialectal or archaic word of the same meaning in [[Westron]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[Christopher Tolkien]] (ed.), "Guide to the Names in ''The Lord of the Rings''", published in ''[[A Tolkien Compass]]'' (edited by [[Jared Lobdell]]), entry ''Appledore''</ref>
